nodes.text: Darksider, also spelled dark-sider, was a catch-all term for any Force-user who followed the dark side of the Force. While it primarily referred to the Sith or Dark Jedi, it could also refer to the Nightsisters of Dathomir, the Sorcerers of Tund, or any other dark side followers.
After his resurrection, Emperor Palpatine formed the Dark Side Elite, a specialized corps of seven Dark Jedi often referred to as Dark-siders.
